modMetaData.name: Miraffe
modMetaData.author: SickBoyWi
modMetaData.description:
A very tall, long-necked animal. Prefers arid environments, and foliage for feed.
Features: A wild animal intended to add some additional flavor to the game. Really, it is a giraffe; I named it miraffe as a tip of the cap to the muffalo.
Throw me a bone if you like this content: https://www.patreon.com/SickBoyWI
